data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Quảng Nam.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Quảng Nam, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Quảng Nam, Vietnam to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 46 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,431,650 lost in Quảng Nam that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Quảng Nam to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, 0.9% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Quảng Nam.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 1,463,300 souls in Quảng Nam and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.section_summary:
the state of Quảng Nam, Vietnam has a population of 1,463,300.

We estimate Quảng Nam has 31,650 people who might know Jesus, 117,375 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,314,275 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Quảng Nam, Vietnam.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
